20110109150403.000|20110109150405.000|CC1|JANUARY, 2011.                  
20110109150405.000|20110109150406.000|CC1|A HORROR STORY IN TUCSON HAS    
20110109150406.000|20110109150407.000|CC1|LEFT SIX DEAD, 13 WOUNDED,      
20110109150407.000|20110109150408.000|CC1|TERRIBLE SADNESS IN ITS WAKE,

20110109150411.000|20110109150412.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110109150412.000|20110109150415.000|CC1|POLICE NOW SAY 22-YEAR-OLD      
20110109150415.000|20110109150419.000|CC1|JARED LOUGHNER, THE ALLEGED     
20110109150419.000|20110109150420.000|CC1|GUNMAN, IS MENTALLY UNSTABLE.   
20110109150420.000|20110109150421.000|CC1|THEY THINK HE TARGETED          
20110109150421.000|20110109150422.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GABRIELLE        
20110109150422.000|20110109150423.000|CC1|GIFFORDS FOR ATTACK.

20110109150426.000|20110109150428.000|CC1|AT A TUCSON GUN STORE.          
20110109150428.000|20110109150429.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA HAS DISPATCHED  
20110109150429.000|20110109150431.000|CC1|F.B.I. DIRECTOR ROBERT MUELLER  
20110109150431.000|20110109150432.000|CC1|TO ARIZONA TO OVERSEE THE       
20110109150432.000|20110109150434.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION.                  
20110109150434.000|20110109150435.000|CC1|AS FOR THE LATEST ON            
20110109150435.000|20110109150437.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDS'        
20110109150437.000|20110109150440.000|CC1|CONDITION, THE ARIZONA          
20110109150440.000|20110109150441.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT REMAINS CRITICAL, BUT  
20110109150441.000|20110109150441.000|CC1|HOSPITAL OFFICIALS SAY THE      
20110109150441.000|20110109150443.000|CC1|OUTLOOK FOR HER SURVIVAL IS     
20110109150443.000|20110109150445.000|CC1|"OPTIMISTIC."

20110109150446.000|20110109150447.000|CC1|SEARCHING FOR A SECOND PERSON

20110109150648.000|20110109150649.000|CC1|ALWAYS DOES, LISTENING TO THE   
20110109150649.000|20110109150650.000|CC1|HOPES AND CONCERNS OF HER

20110109150752.000|20110109150753.000|CC1|ARMY MEDICAL CENTER AFTER       
20110109150753.000|20110109150754.000|CC1|BEING RELEASED BRIEFLY ON       
20110109150754.000|20110109150755.000|CC1|FRIDAY.                         
20110109150755.000|20110109150756.000|CC1|SENATOR DOLE IS 87 YEARS OLD.

20110109151606.000|20110109151607.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING.                   
20110109151607.000|20110109151608.000|CC1|HE'S MADE GENERAL THREATS BUT   
20110109151608.000|20110109151611.000|CC1|HE DOES NOT HAVE A CRIMINAL

20110109151829.000|20110109151831.000|CC1|OUR SUNDAY MORNING ALMANAC.     
20110109151831.000|20110109151835.000|CC1|JANUARY 9, 1776, 235 YEARS AGO  
20110109151835.000|20110109151838.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110109151838.000|20110109151840.000|CC1|THE DAY AMERICAN COLONISTS GOT  
20110109151840.000|20110109151842.000|CC1|A DOSE OF COMMON SENSE.         
20110109151842.000|20110109151843.000|CC1|COMMON SENSE, BEING THE NAME    
20110109151843.000|20110109151845.000|CC1|OF THE PRO INDEPENDENCE         
20110109151845.000|20110109151848.000|CC1|PAMPHLET PUBLISHED THAT DAY BY  
20110109151848.000|20110109151849.000|CC1|THOMAS PAYNE.                   
20110109151849.000|20110109151850.000|CC1|PAYNE HAD ARRIVED FROM ENGLAND  
20110109151850.000|20110109151852.000|CC1|LESS THAN TWO YEARS BEFORE AND  
20110109151852.000|20110109151854.000|CC1|HAD QUICKLY BECOME THE          
20110109151854.000|20110109151857.000|CC1|REVOLUTION'S MOST OUTSPOKEN     
20110109151857.000|20110109151900.000|CC1|PAMPHLETEER, AN 18th CENTURY    
20110109151900.000|20110109151902.000|CC1|BLOGGER, IF YOU WILL.           
20110109151902.000|20110109151903.000|CC1|PAYNE WROTE OF AMERICA'S TIES   
20110109151903.000|20110109151904.000|CC1|TO BRITAIN, EVERYTHING THAT IS  
20110109151904.000|20110109151907.000|CC1|RIGHT OR NATURAL PLEADS FOR     
20110109151907.000|20110109151913.000|CC1|SEPARATION.                     
20110109151913.000|20110109151915.000|CC1|TOWARD THE END OF 1776, PAYNE   
20110109151915.000|20110109151917.000|CC1|LAUNCHED A NEW SERIES OF        
20110109151917.000|20110109151918.000|CC1|PAMPHLETS CALLED THE AMERICAN   
20110109151918.000|20110109151921.000|CC1|CRISIS, WHICH BEGAN "THESE ARE  
20110109151921.000|20110109151929.000|CC1|THE TIMES THAT TRY MEN'S SOULS."
20110109151929.000|20110109151932.000|CC1|PAYNE WENT ON TO SEVER TIES OF  
20110109151932.000|20110109151933.000|CC1|HIS OWN.                        
20110109151933.000|20110109151935.000|CC1|HIS HEAD STRONG WAYS LEFT HIM   
20110109151935.000|20110109151937.000|CC1|OUT OF POPULAR FAVOR BY         
20110109151937.000|20110109151938.000|CC1|REVOLUTION'S END.               
20110109151938.000|20110109151939.000|CC1|AFTER A WHILE HE ACTUALLY       
20110109151939.000|20110109151940.000|CC1|MOVED BACK TO ENGLAND.          
20110109151940.000|20110109151942.000|CC1|NEXT HE WAS OFF TO THE          
20110109151942.000|20110109151944.000|CC1|REVOLUTION IN FRANCE WHERE HE   
20110109151944.000|20110109151946.000|CC1|RAN AFOUL OF ONE OF ITS         
20110109151946.000|20110109151950.000|CC1|LEADERS ROBESPIERRE AND BARELY  
20110109151950.000|20110109151952.000|CC1|ESCAPED THE GUILLOTINE.         
20110109151952.000|20110109151954.000|CC1|PAYNE EVENTUALLY RETURNED TO    
20110109151954.000|20110109151955.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES WHERE HE      
20110109151955.000|20110109151958.000|CC1|DIED IN 1809 AT THE AGE OF 72.  
20110109151958.000|20110109152000.000|CC1|JUST SIX PEOPLE ARE SAID TO     
20110109152000.000|20110109152002.000|CC1|HAVE ATTENDED HIS FUNERAL.      
20110109152002.000|20110109152004.000|CC1|HIS REMAINS WERE BURIED IN NEW  
20110109152004.000|20110109152006.000|CC1|ROW SHELL, NEW YORK.            
20110109152006.000|20110109152007.000|CC1|BUT JUST A FEW YEARS LATER      
20110109152007.000|20110109152009.000|CC1|THEY WERE DUG UP AND LOST.      
20110109152009.000|20110109152011.000|CC1|WE ARE LEFT WITH ONLY HIS       
20110109152011.000|20110109152020.000|CC1|INSPIRING WORDS.

20110109152033.000|20110109152046.000|CC1|SEDARIS.

20110109152046.000|20110109152047.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110109152047.000|20110109152048.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110109152048.000|20110109152050.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110109152050.000|20110109152050.000|XDS|%    TITLE:   
20110109152050.000|20110109152050.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110109152050.000|20110109152053.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110109152051.000|20110109152051.000|XDS|%    TITLE: BMPX0078000H
20110109152053.000|20110109152053.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110109152053.000|20110109152056.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110109152056.000|20110109152058.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110109152058.000|20110109152100.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110109152100.000|20110109152100.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110109152100.000|20110109152102.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110109152102.000|20110109152102.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110109152102.000|20110109152104.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110109152104.000|20110109152104.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110109152104.000|20110109152106.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110109152106.000|20110109152108.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110109152108.000|20110109152108.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110109152108.000|20110109152109.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110109152109.000|20110109152109.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110109152109.000|20110109152112.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110109152112.000|20110109152112.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110109152112.000|20110109152115.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110109152115.000|20110109152115.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110109152115.000|20110109152118.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110109152118.000|20110109152118.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110109152118.000|20110109152119.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110109152119.000|20110109152119.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110109152119.000|20110109152121.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110109152121.000|20110109152123.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110109152123.000|20110109152123.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110109152123.000|20110109152125.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110109152125.000|20110109152125.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110109152125.000|20110109152126.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110109152126.000|20110109152128.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110109152128.000|20110109152128.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110109152128.000|20110109152130.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110109152130.000|20110109152130.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110109152130.000|20110109152132.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110109152132.000|20110109152132.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110109152132.000|20110109152134.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110109152134.000|20110109152136.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110109152136.000|20110109152136.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110109152136.000|20110109152138.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110109152138.000|20110109152138.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110109152138.000|20110109152141.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110109152141.000|20110109152141.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110109152141.000|20110109152143.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110109152143.000|20110109152143.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110109152143.000|20110109152144.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110109152144.000|20110109152144.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110109152144.000|20110109152147.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110109152147.000|20110109152147.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110109152147.000|20110109152150.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110109152150.000|20110109152151.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110109152151.000|20110109152153.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110109152153.000|20110109152153.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110109152153.000|20110109152155.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110109152155.000|20110109152155.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110109152155.000|20110109152158.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110109152158.000|20110109152158.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110109152158.000|20110109152304.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.

20110109152440.000|20110109152442.000|CC1|>> HE YELLED IT REALLY LOUD.    
20110109152442.000|20110109152444.000|CC1|>> SHE KEPT REPEATING THAT AND  
20110109152444.000|20110109152447.000|CC1|THEN FINALLY MISS BAKER LOOKED  
20110109152447.000|20110109152449.000|CC1|OVER.                           
20110109152449.000|20110109152451.000|CC1|WELL, SHE WON'T STOP CALLING    
20110109152451.000|20110109152453.000|CC1|ME GAY.                         
20110109152453.000|20110109152455.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NAME CALLING MAY   
20110109152455.000|20110109152456.000|CC1|SEEM LIKE CHILD'S PLAY, BUT IT  
20110109152456.000|20110109152458.000|CC1|ISN'T.                          
20110109152458.000|20110109152500.000|CC1|THIS IS THE RUN OF THE MILL     
20110109152500.000|20110109152501.000|CC1|BULLYING THAT DOESN'T MAKE      
20110109152501.000|20110109152503.000|CC1|HEADLINES.                      
20110109152503.000|20110109152505.000|CC1|IT STEAMS ANDFESTERS AND CAN    
20110109152505.000|20110109152506.000|CC1|MAKE JUST GOING TO SCHOOL AN    
20110109152506.000|20110109152508.000|CC1|AGONY.

20110109152512.000|20110109152513.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT HERE MAY SEEM

20110109152514.000|20110109152516.000|CC1|>> WELL, WHEN IT STARTS TO

20110109153103.000|20110109153105.000|CC1|SCARRING, RESEARCHERS SAY IT'S  
20110109153105.000|20110109153107.000|CC1|VERBAL BULLYING THAT CAN CAUSE  
20110109153107.000|20110109153108.000|CC1|LASTING WOUNDS.
